Title: Creates the crime of crimes against a delivery person when a specified offense is committed against a restaurant delivery person
Summary: Creates the crime of crimes against a delivery person when a specified offense is committed against a restaurant delivery person; for purposes of this crime a delivery person shall mean a person employed by a restaurant or put into service by a restaurant to deliver prepared food to a location outside the restaurant pursuant to an order placed by the purported recipient of the food.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to crimes against a delivery person
